Description
Feel like M. Bison from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of boots! Combine it with the suit bottom to become the true leader of Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour M. Bison de Street Fighter IV avec ces bottes alternatives ! Essayez-les avec le bas de costume pour devenir le leader de Shadaloo ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen Stiefeln wie M. Bison aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere sie mit dem alternativen Anzug und werde zum wahren Anführer von Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Diventa M. Bison di Street Fighter IV con questo paio alternativo di stivali! Abbinali alla parte sotto del suo costume per diventare il vero leader di Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este par de botas alternativas y siéntete como M. Bison de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combínalas con el traje y siéntete como el líder de Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ベガになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のブーツ スーツ （下）と合わせてあなたもベガ気分 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이슨이 되는 어렌지 ver. 슈트(하의)와 맞추면 당신도 바이슨. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like M. Bison from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of boots! Combine it with the suit bottom to become the true leader of Shadaloo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為M. Bison的靴子之特別版。跟服裝 (下)合起來讓你擁有M. Bison的感覺。Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
